snippet: Managers of three of the fourth quarter’s better-performing mutual funds found winners in a variety of places.
abstract: Managers of three of the fourth quarter’s better-performing mutual funds found winners in such varied places as small-capitalization stocks, auto parts retailers and aerospace companies
lead_paragraph: Managers of three of the fourth quarter’s better-performing mutual funds found winners in a variety of places.

headline.seo: Three Mutual Funds at the Front of a Late 2011 Rally
headline.main: For Three Funds, a Front-Row Seat on a Rally
headline.print_headline: For Three Funds, a Front-Row Seat to a Fourth-Quarter Rally
